text: Pirita can be *Pirita (district), a district () of Tallinn, Estonia **Pirita (subdistrict), a subdistrict () of Pirita district *Pirita River, a river in northern Estonia *Pîrîta, a commune in Dubăsari district, Moldova *Pirita, a village in Zlatna town, Alba County, Romania *Pirita, Karjalan tytär, a historical novel by Finnish author Kaari Utrio *Ripogonum scandens, a New Zealand native vine, sometimes called "Pirita" *a name for the mineral pyrite in Romance languages ==People== *Pirita Näkkäläjärvi, president of Finland's Sami parliament
title: Pirita
